title: Presentation at Green Village English Boarding Secondary School
descriptions: It was an exciting day at Green Village English Boarding Secondary School as CoSoG Nepal organized  a conversation on the wide range of career options in computer science. We shared a lot of lessons learned from our past initiatives and we shed light on the significant impact of CS clubs. Thank you to everyone involved!

title: Talk on Computer Science Opportunities in Nepal at Magus Secondary School, Kirtipur
descriptions: At Magus Secondary School in Kirtipur, we had an insightful session. We discussed the wealth of opportunities present in the field of computer science within Nepal. Furthermore, we provided an overview of CS club operations, covering key aspects to think about when establishing and running a club, along with strategies for implementing impactful initiatives within the school. A sincere thank you to all who contributed to the success of this event, and a special appreciation to Magus Secondary School.

title: Workshop on Computer Science Opportunities at Everest Boarding School, Kathmandu
descriptions: CoSoG Nepal conducted an informative session at Everest Boarding School, Kathmandu. We discussed the wide array of opportunities within the field of computer science in Nepal. Additionally, we provided insights into the functioning of CS clubs, offering guidance on starting and structuring clubs effectively. We express gratitude to all who supported us in organizing this event.

title: CoSoG Nepal at Constellation Secondary English Boarding School
descriptions: It was a remarkable day at Constellation Secondary English Boarding School as CoSoG Nepal engaged with students in a discussion on the diverse prospects within the realm of Computer Science. Drawing from our of experience, we shared valuable insights from our past projects and shed light on the transformative role of CS clubs.

title: Seminar at Hathausa Little Star English Boarding School
descriptions: We had an amazing day at Hathausa Little Star English Boarding School, where we discussed the various opportunities in the field of Computer Science. We also shared insights from our previous projects and CS club experiences.

title: CoSoG Nepal at Skylark Secondary English Boarding School, Kapilvastu
descriptions: We conducted an engaging session with the grade 8 and 9 students, where Aashish took the stage to discuss the various CS opportunities in Nepal. We had a blast dicussing how to form a CS club, how to organize events and sharing insights from our previous CS club experiences.

title: Computer Science Seminar at Deep Boarding High School, Kathmandu
descriptions: Our CoSoG Nepal team recently hosted an informative seminar at Deep Boarding High School in Kathmandu, where we talked about the ever-evolving field of technology, specifically computer science. We examined the wide range of opportunities available and discussed ways in which students can capitalize on them. Furthermore, we offered valuable insights into improving the school's CS culture, stressing the significance of CS clubs in nurturing interest and improving skills. We provided strategies for starting and managing CS clubs effectively, so that students can  engage actively with the CS community at their school. We express our sincere gratitude to all who contributed to the success of this event.

title: Opportunities in CS & Workings of CS Clubs: A Presentation at The Rolling Stones School
descriptions: We recently hosted a seminar at The Rolling Stones School, where we talked about the exciting opportunities, abundant resources, and our mission to foster a thriving CS culture. Plus, we shared insights from our previous projects and CS club experiences.

title: CoSoG Nepal at  LB Namuna Academy, Butwal.
descriptions: We delved into exciting opportunities, abundant resources, and our mission to foster a thriving CS culture. Plus, we shared insights from our previous projects and CS club experiences.

title: CoSoG Nepal had an amazing day at Butwal Madina School, Butwal.
descriptions: We took the stage to unfold the various opportunities in the field of Computer Science. Additionally, we discussed the hierarchy of a CS club, how to form a CS club, and how to organize events.

title: CoSoG Nepal recently organized a mini-event at Gyanodaya Secondary School, Kathmandu.
descriptions: We took the stage to unfold the myriad opportunities in the dynamic field of Computer ScienceðŸ’» in Nepal. Furthermore, we discussed the hierarchy of a CS club, how to form a CS club, and how to organize events. We thank everyone who helped us organize this event, especially to all the students at Gyanodaya who gave their valuable time for this event.

title: Computer Science in +2 (high school)
descriptions: Computer Science in +2 program was a virtual career guidance program designed to help the SEE graduates make informed decision about their career by choosing right stream after 10th grade. We're successful to help over 75 students directly and many more through our recorded session.

We laid out the differences between Computer Science in science and management stream; we explored different career paths within Computer Science; we explored the job and educational opportunities in Nepal and abroad, and discovered the boundless potential that awaits you in this ever-evolving landscape.
